name: Manas
description: A great hero who united the Kyrgyz tribes and led them to victory.

name: Bakai
description: A wise advisor and spiritual mentor of Manas.

name: Kanykei
description: The loyal and brave wife of Manas.

name: Almambet
description: Manas' loyal friend and fearless warrior.

name: Kökötöy
description: A respected elder and nobleman of the Kyrgyz people.
